briefdescription.para: This internal API puts the device to sleep mode.
This internal API writes the power mode in the sensor.

parameterdescription.para: : Variable which contains the power mode to be set.

briefdescription.para: This internal API is used to validate the device pointer for null conditions.

detaileddescription.para: This internal API is used to validate the device structure pointer for null conditions.

memberdef.argsstring: (const uint8_t *reg_addr, uint8_t *temp_buff, const uint8_t *reg_data, uint32_t len)
memberdef.name: interleave_reg_addr

briefdescription.para: This internal API interleaves the register address between the register data buffer for burst write operation.

parameterdescription.para: : Contains the temporary buffer to store the register data and register address.
: Contains the register data to be written in the temporary buffer.
: No of bytes of data to be written for burst write.

briefdescription.para: This internal API reads the calibration data from the sensor, parse it and store in the device structure.
This internal API is used to parse the temperature and pressure calibration data and store it in the device structure.

detaileddescription.para: This internal API is used to parse the temperature and pressure calibration data and store it in device structure.

parameterdescription.para: : Structure instance of bme280_dev to store the calib data.
: Contains the calibration data to be parsed.

briefdescription.para: This internal API is used to parse the humidity calibration data and store it in device structure.

parameterdescription.para: : Structure instance of bme280_dev to store the calib data.
: Contains calibration data to be parsed.

briefdescription.para: This internal API is used to identify the settings which the user wants to modify in the sensor.

parameterdescription.para: : Contains the settings subset to identify particular group of settings which the user is interested to change.

simplesect.para: Indicates whether user is interested to modify the settings which are related to sub_settings.
True -> User wants to modify this group of settings
False -> User does not want to modify this group of settings

briefdescription.para: This API sets the humidity over sampling settings of the sensor.

detaileddescription.para: This API sets the humidity oversampling settings of the sensor.

parameterdescription.para: : Pointer variable which contains the settings to be set in the sensor.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint8_t desired_settings, const struct bme280_settings *settings, struct bme280_dev *dev)
memberdef.name: set_osr_settings

briefdescription.para: This internal API sets the oversampling settings for pressure, temperature and humidity in the sensor.

parameterdescription.para: : Variable used to select the settings which are to be set.
: Pointer variable which contains the settings to be set in the sensor.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint8_t desired_settings, const struct bme280_settings *settings, struct bme280_dev *dev)
memberdef.name: set_osr_press_temp_settings

briefdescription.para: This API sets the pressure and/or temperature oversampling settings in the sensor according to the settings selected by the user.

parameterdescription.para: variable to select the pressure and/or temperature oversampling settings.
: Pointer variable which contains the settings to be set in the sensor.

briefdescription.para: This internal API fills the pressure oversampling settings provided by the user in the data buffer so as to write in the sensor.

parameterdescription.para: : Pointer variable which contains the settings to be set in the sensor.
: Variable which is filled according to the pressure oversampling data provided by the user.

briefdescription.para: This internal API fills the temperature oversampling settings provided by the user in the data buffer so as to write in the sensor.

parameterdescription.para: : Pointer variable which contains the settings to be set in the sensor.
: Variable which is filled according to the temperature oversampling data provided by the user.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint8_t desired_settings, const struct bme280_settings *settings, struct bme280_dev *dev)
memberdef.name: set_filter_standby_settings

briefdescription.para: This internal API sets the filter and/or standby duration settings in the sensor according to the settings selected by the user.

parameterdescription.para: : Pointer variable which contains the settings to be set in the sensor.

briefdescription.para: This internal API fills the filter settings provided by the user in the data buffer so as to write in the sensor.

parameterdescription.para: : Pointer variable which contains the settings to be set in the sensor.
: Variable which is filled according to the filter settings data provided by the user.

briefdescription.para: This internal API fills the standby duration settings provided by the user in the data buffer so as to write in the sensor.

parameterdescription.para: : Pointer variable which contains the settings to be set in the sensor.
: Variable which is filled according to the standby settings data provided by the user.

briefdescription.para: This internal API parse the oversampling(pressure, temperature and humidity), filter and standby duration settings and store in the device structure.

detaileddescription.para: This internal API parse the oversampling(pressure, temperature and humidity), filter and standby duration settings and store in the bme280_settings structure.

parameterdescription.para: : Pointer variable which contains the settings to be get in the sensor.

briefdescription.para: This API is used to parse the pressure, temperature and humidity data and store it in the bme280_uncomp_data structure instance.

parameterdescription.para: : Contains register data which needs to be parsed
: Contains the uncompensated pressure, temperature and humidity data

briefdescription.para: This internal API reloads the already existing device settings in the sensor after soft reset.

parameterdescription.para: : Pointer variable which contains the settings to be set in the sensor.

briefdescription.para: This internal API is used to compensate the raw pressure data and return the compensated pressure data in double data type.

parameterdescription.para: : Pointer to the calibration data structure.

briefdescription.para: This internal API is used to compensate the raw humidity data and return the compensated humidity data in double data type.

parameterdescription.para: : Pointer to the calibration data structure.

briefdescription.para: This internal API is used to compensate the raw temperature data and return the compensated temperature data in double data type.
This API is the entry point. It reads the chip-id and calibration data from the sensor.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint8_t reg_addr, uint8_t *reg_data, uint32_t len, struct bme280_dev *dev)
memberdef.name: bme280_get_regs

briefdescription.para: This API reads the data from the given register address of the sensor.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint8_t *reg_addr, const uint8_t *reg_data, uint32_t len, struct bme280_dev *dev)
memberdef.name: bme280_set_regs

briefdescription.para: This API writes the given data to the register address of the sensor.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint8_t desired_settings, const struct bme280_settings *settings, struct bme280_dev *dev)
memberdef.name: bme280_set_sensor_settings

briefdescription.para: This API sets the oversampling, filter and standby duration (normal mode) settings in the sensor.
This API gets the oversampling, filter and standby duration (normal mode) settings from the sensor.
This API sets the power mode of the sensor.
This API gets the power mode of the sensor.
This API performs the soft reset of the sensor.
This API reads the pressure, temperature and humidity data from the sensor, compensates the data and store it in the bme280_data structure instance passed by the user.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint8_t sensor_comp, const struct bme280_uncomp_data *uncomp_data, struct bme280_data *comp_data, struct bme280_calib_data *calib_data)
memberdef.name: bme280_compensate_data

briefdescription.para: This API is used to compensate the pressure and/or temperature and/or humidity data according to the component selected by the user.
This API is used to calculate the maximum delay in milliseconds required for the temperature/pressure/humidity(whichever are enabled) measurement to complete.
Sensor driver for BME280 sensor.
